author: trawick
msg: *) Reorder the definitions for mod_ldap and mod_auth_ldap within
config.m4 to make sure the parent mod_ldap is defined first.
This ensures that mod_ldap comes before mod_auth_ldap in the
httpd.conf file, which is necessary for mod_auth_ldap to load.

author: stas
msg: add the extra subdirs of t/response earlier to @INC, so if modperl is
started earlier than usual (e.g., because of perlloadmodule) the modules
in these dirs could be found

author: wrowe
msg: Fix a declaration mismatch.  We are down to const'ness errors.

author: wrowe
msg: Make the code simpler to follow, and perhaps clear up the follow-symlink
bug reports we have seen on bugzilla.  e.g. 14206 etc.
